alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Baldwin Inland; Butler; Choctaw; Clarke; Conecuh; Covington; Crenshaw; Escambia; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal; Mobile Inland; Monroe; Washington; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 30 at 3:15AM CDT until November 01 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN AFFECT AREAWIDE WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR A LONG DURATION OF CRITICALLY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY COMBINED WITH GUSTY NORTHERLY WINDS... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT AREAWIDE WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR A LONG DURATION OF CRITICALLY LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY COMBINED WITH GUSTY NORTHERLY WINDS... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect Wednesday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 051, 052, 053, 054, 055, 056, 057, 058, 059, 060, 067, 075, 076, 078, 079, 201, 202, 203, 204, 205, 206, 261, 262, 263, 264, 265 and 266. * WINDS...North 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 TO 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and persistent severe to extreme drought intensity over the local area can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
